Desc.entry: Marion Thomson tutors in drawing and painting for adults. All abilities are welcome, from complete beginners to more experienced students. Areas covered include post 16 and A level, university application, portfolio building, curriculum drawing and painting and scholarship. Tuition tailored to individual students or as a shared session between two students. Sessions can be taken at her studio in Sheffield 11 or at the student's home. Qualifications - BA, PGDip, RAS, PGCE. Current CRB certificate held.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 9.30am-12.30pm (still life, life drawing/painting, landscape & portrait classes, blocks of 5-7 weeks, please contact for details)
